item.description:
The Kendall Square Cinema is still showing The King's Speech, and I would still like to see this Oscar winner (Best Movie, among others). If you need more informaton about the movie, go to http://www.imdb.com. For more information about the movie theater, go to http://www.landmarktheaters.com/.

Look for me and my bright red backpack in the theater lobby between 4:30 and 4:45 p.m. I'll buy my ticket at 4:30 p.m. and wait by the foot of the staircase in the lobby until 4:45, maybe 4:50. I want to see the previews, so if you are running late, you can find me in the auditorium reading the credits after the movie. I'll linger a bit in the lobby after the movie and the credits, too, in case people would like to go The Friendly Toast (http://www.thefriendlytoast.net) for tea, hot chocolate, or something to eat.

I had to postpone this event from Wednesday, March 23. My apologies if the schedule change created any confusion, but I couldn't repost this until I was sure that the Kendall was still showing The King's Speech.
item.how_to_find_us: Note the new movie time. Look for my bright red backpack. See the event description for more details.
item.name: Do-Over for The King's Speech at the Kendall
